channel.title: Scientific Modeling on Jan Teusen (né Boelts)
channel.description: Recent content in Scientific Modeling on Jan Teusen (né Boelts)

item.title: Simulated Data is All You Need: Bayesian Parameter Inference for Scientific Simulators with SBI
item.description: A EuroSciPy 2024 talk on using simulation-based inference (SBI) for Bayesian parameter estimation in scientific models, utilizing the sbi library.
